Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> we<S>2248</S> ought<S>1163</S> to give the more earnest<S>4056</S> heed<S>4337</S> to the things which we have heard<S>191</S>, lest at any time<S>3379</S> we should let them slip<S>3901</S>. <sup>let: Gr. run out as leaking vessels</sup>
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> the word<S>3056</S> spoken<S>2980</S> by<S>1223</S> angels<S>32</S> was<S>1096</S> stedfast<S>949</S>, and<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> transgression<S>3847</S> and<S>2532</S> disobedience<S>3876</S> received<S>2983</S> a just<S>1738</S> recompence of reward<S>3405</S>;
How<S>4459</S> shall we<S>2249</S> escape<S>1628</S>, if we neglect<S>272</S> so great<S>5082</S> salvation<S>4991</S>; which<S>3748</S> at the first<S>746</S> began<S>2983</S> to be spoken<S>2980</S> by<S>1223</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, and was confirmed<S>950</S> unto<S>1519</S> us<S>2248</S> by<S>5259</S> them that heard<S>191</S> him;
God<S>2316</S> also bearing them witness<S>4901</S>, both<S>5037</S> with signs<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S>, and<S>2532</S> with divers<S>4164</S> miracles<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> gifts<S>3311</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, according to<S>2596</S> his own<S>846</S> will<S>2308</S>? <sup>gifts: or, distributions</sup>
For<S>1063</S> unto the angels<S>32</S> hath he<S>5293</S> not<S>3756</S> put in subjection<S>5293</S> the world<S>3625</S> to come<S>3195</S>, whereof<S>4012</S> <S>3739</S> we speak<S>2980</S>.
But<S>1161</S> one<S>5100</S> in a certain place<S>4225</S> testified<S>1263</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, What<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> man<S>444</S>, that<S>3754</S> thou art mindful<S>3403</S> of him<S>846</S>? or<S>2228</S> the son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>, that<S>3754</S> thou visitest<S>1980</S> him<S>846</S>?
Thou madest<S>1642</S> him<S>846</S> a little<S>1024</S> <S>5100</S> lower<S>1642</S> than<S>3844</S> the angels<S>32</S>; thou crownedst<S>4737</S> him<S>846</S> with glory<S>1391</S> and<S>2532</S> honour<S>5092</S>, and<S>2532</S> didst set<S>2525</S> him<S>846</S> over<S>1909</S> the works<S>2041</S> of thy<S>4675</S> hands<S>5495</S>: <sup>lower: or, while inferior to</sup>
Thou hast put<S>5293</S> all things<S>3956</S> in subjection<S>5293</S> under<S>5270</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>. For<S>1063</S> in<S>1722</S> that he put<S>5293</S> all<S>3956</S> in subjection under<S>5293</S> him<S>846</S>, he left<S>863</S> nothing that is not<S>3762</S> put under<S>506</S> him<S>846</S>. But<S>1161</S> now<S>3568</S> we see<S>3708</S> not yet<S>3768</S> all things<S>3956</S> put under<S>5293</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> we see<S>991</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, who<S>3588</S> was made<S>1642</S> a little<S>1024</S> <S>5100</S> lower<S>1642</S> than<S>3844</S> the angels<S>32</S> for<S>1223</S> the suffering<S>3804</S> of death<S>2288</S>, crowned<S>4737</S> with glory<S>1391</S> and<S>2532</S> honour<S>5092</S>; that<S>3704</S> he<S>1089</S> by the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S> should taste<S>1089</S> death<S>2288</S> for<S>5228</S> every man<S>3956</S>. <sup>for the: or, by the</sup>
For<S>1063</S> it became<S>4241</S> him<S>846</S>, for<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> are all things<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> are all things<S>3956</S>, in bringing<S>71</S> many<S>4183</S> sons<S>5207</S> unto<S>1519</S> glory<S>1391</S>, to make<S>5048</S> the captain<S>747</S> of their<S>846</S> salvation<S>4991</S> perfect<S>5048</S> through<S>1223</S> sufferings<S>3804</S>.
For<S>1063</S> both<S>5037</S> he that sanctifieth<S>37</S> and<S>2532</S> they who are sanctified<S>37</S> are all<S>3956</S> of<S>1537</S> one<S>1520</S>: for<S>1223</S> which<S>3739</S> cause<S>156</S> he is<S>1870</S> not<S>3756</S> ashamed<S>1870</S> to call<S>2564</S> them<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, I will declare<S>518</S> thy<S>4675</S> name<S>3686</S> unto my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of the church<S>1577</S> will I sing praise<S>5214</S> unto thee<S>4571</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S>, I<S>1473</S> will<S>2071</S> put my trust<S>3982</S> in<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>. And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S>, Behold<S>2400</S> I<S>1473</S> and<S>2532</S> the children<S>3813</S> which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath given<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S>.
Forasmuch<S>1893</S> then<S>3767</S> as the children<S>3813</S> are partakers<S>2841</S> of flesh<S>4561</S> and<S>2532</S> blood<S>129</S>, he<S>3348</S> also<S>2532</S> himself<S>846</S> likewise<S>3898</S> took part<S>3348</S> of the same<S>846</S>; that<S>2443</S> through<S>1223</S> death<S>2288</S> he might destroy<S>2673</S> him that had<S>2192</S> the power<S>2904</S> of death<S>2288</S>, that is<S>5123</S>, the devil<S>1228</S>;
And<S>2532</S> deliver<S>525</S> them<S>5128</S> who<S>3745</S> through<S>1223</S> fear<S>5401</S> of death<S>2288</S> were<S>2258</S> all<S>3956</S> their lifetime<S>2198</S> subject<S>1777</S> to bondage<S>1397</S>.
For<S>1063</S> verily<S>1222</S> he took<S>1949</S> not<S>3756</S> on<S>1949</S> him the nature of angels<S>32</S>; but<S>235</S> he took on<S>1949</S> him the seed<S>4690</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>. <sup>took not: Gr. taketh not hold of angels, but of the seed of Abraham he taketh hold</sup>
Wherefore<S>3606</S> in<S>2596</S> all things<S>3956</S> it behoved him<S>3784</S> to be made like<S>3666</S> unto his brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>2443</S> he might be<S>1096</S> a merciful<S>1655</S> and<S>2532</S> faithful<S>4103</S> high priest<S>749</S> in things pertaining to<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>, to<S>1519</S> make reconciliation for<S>2433</S> the sins<S>266</S> of the people<S>2992</S>.
For<S>1063</S> in<S>1722</S> that<S>3739</S> he<S>3958</S> himself<S>846</S> hath suffered<S>3958</S> being tempted<S>3985</S>, he is able<S>1410</S> to succour<S>997</S> them that are tempted<S>3985</S>.
